name: Sprout for YNAB
description: An extension for YNAB that allows users to quickly add a transaction to their budget.
author: Daniel Cabuslay
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self'; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src https://api.youneedabudget.com https://chino.danielcabuslay.workers.dev
